name: Blender Cucumber Yogurt Soup With Cumin and Paprika
description: This is so refreshing that I like to pour it into a glass and drink it as I would a lassi.
keywords: appetizer, side dish, cucumber, yogurt, gluten-free, healthy, low cholesterol, low-fat, low-sodium, nut-free, vegetarian, summer
recipeIngredient: 3/4 pound cucumbers (1 European or 4 Persian), peeled and seeded if using regular cucumbers, coarsely chopped
1 quart plain low-fat yogurt or buttermilk
2 garlic cloves, peeled, cut in half, green shoots removed
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
Chopped fresh dill, cilantro, mint or chives for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Blend all of the ingredients except the herbs until smooth. Taste and adjust seasoning. Refrigerate for 1 hour or longer before serving.
